transcript:
Customer: Wo le add kar di usme kaun se system me jana hai?
Executive: Ab upar three line pe pehle click karenge tab dekhenge niche kuch features aa rahe hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ab usme se account manager wale pe click kariye.
Customer: Account manager?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Chauthe number pe hai.
Customer: Dobara karna hoga abhi wo.
Customer: Ek, do, teen, char. Account manager haan kar diya madam.
Executive: Ab usme click karne ke baad me ab jo option aa raha hai aapke paas me waha dekhiye share screen karne ka option aa raha hai teesre number pe.
Customer: To ye to ek jese hi system hai ek, do, teen.
Executive: Haan. Share kya hai usme?
Executive: Haan, us pe click kariye.
Customer: Teen number wala ko?
Executive: Haan, teen number wala dabaiye.
Customer: Ye to price wais mang raha hai kuch. Share good and ye mang raha hai likha hua hai.
Executive: Kya mang raha hai?
Customer: Ye share ka photo.
Customer: Share ka hai photo. Haan haan.
Customer: Share good and ye likha hua hai aise furniture.
Customer: Kaun se function me jana hai isme?
Executive: Sir, this is likh ke aa rahi hai share karne ke liye aa raha hoga, apni screen share karne ke liye aa raha hoga.
Customer: Abhi mere se to samajh me nahi aayega.
Executive: Abhi aapne baad me jab aapne teesre number pe click kiya to kya aa raha hai?
Customer: Kya likha hua hai ye to kursiyon ka photo likha hua hai dining hai table wagera. Upar camere ka nishan hai sabse pehle.
Executive: Haan, to camere ka nishan usi pe click kariye na, usko allow kariye.
Customer: Camere wale ko?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ye to photo dikh raha hai isme to kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Aise samajh ye mere wale hi photo chade hue hai wo dikh rahe hai.
Executive: Haan, usko aapne pehle se.
Customer: Isme kya karna hai?
Executive: Kahi ek jagah likh ke aa raha hoga jaari kare karke.
Customer: Thoda mere se samay kharab karne se samajh me aayega nahi.
Executive: Sir, to aapko phone use karna nahi aata to mai kya karu?
Customer: Meri meri galti hai.
Customer: Ghar aake thodi na sikhaungi chalo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance with screen sharing.

Resolution:

- Executive guided the customer to share screen.

Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Negative | Annoyed -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- screen sharing, account manager, furniture
